text: Jisasɨ 8.34 Sng 110.1, HJL 7.55-56, Kl 3.1-2, Ib 7.25, 9.24, 1 Jo 2.1 Kɨlaisɨ agaŋ hɨmavɨla cɨhu hɨhi iahami uami. Hɨhi iahavɨla iabi Asɨ dɨ human sɨmi kɨlikɨli hɨvɨ hɨnihɨni aludɨ ahɨliahuiahu saŋ nudɨ aba aba hɨnilalɨ uami. Hameŋ sadaŋ hulaŋ mu aludɨ lusɨŋ sɨbɨlɨ agɨlasaŋ lɨbɨmɨgumɨgu ma abɨbali uami.
